content: SPX Masonry diamond blade Ultimate diamond blade with Equidist technology optimized for cutting in masonry ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond blades and cup wheels- - - ### FEATURES:Features Equidist technology provides superior cutting speed and performance Engineered to boost productivity in everyday cutting applications on masonry Designed to outlast – with large, specially-bonded diamond segments Thick steel core and laser welding technology for maximum reliability and safety Easy re-ordering – scannable QR code on the blade helps you easily re-order new blades, or verify your blade’s intended base material and target tool type Applications Cutting, resizing and reshaping a wide range of mineral construction materials, especially masonry, brick and sand limestone Fast cutting even in hard and special masonry base materials For use with all Hilti hand-held diamond cutting tools including angle grinders, electric cutters and gas saws ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool type: Angle grinder, Electric cutter, Gas saw, Battery cut-off saw Base material: Masonry Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Tool type | Angle grinder, Electric cutter, Gas saw, Battery cut-off saw | Base material | Masonry | Product Class | Ultimate | Wet or dry operation | Wet and Dry ### ITEMS- 2118043 - Cutting Disc EQD SPX 12x1 mas. - Package Size 1 pc - 2118026 - Cutting Disc EQD SPX 12x1 DCH mas. - Package Size 1 pc - 2118044 - Cutting Disc EQD SPX 14x1 mas. - Package Size 1 pc - 2118045 - Cutting Disc EQD SPX 16x1 mas. - Package Size 1 pc
